channel.title: Getting stuff at the top of your screen
channel.description: Yeah, I know. Search for Public boolean process, and add WritePlayers(); under it. I did that, and then added the thing towards the top. Well, I used to have it working on my other server, because I used the getting players and server name at the top of the screen. That one worked. But this one, (Im using the exact same source, Cheezscape 80)needs a different spelling or something of the WritePlayers();. I also used Mod Taharok's skill thing on my last, and got everything working, till I had to restart. So someone please tell me how to put the WritePlayers(); in under public boolean process (FOR CHEEZSCAPE 80!)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 07:58:20 PM[/size][hr]Also another thing. When ppl playing on my server, and level up, they disconnect. It happened on my last server, even when I had the stuff up. Then, I coded it in my friend's server, and it worked...

item.title: Getting stuff at the top of your screen
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yeah, I know. Search for Public boolean process, and add WritePlayers(); under it. I did that, and then added the thing towards the top. Well, I used to have it working on my other server, because I used the getting players and server name at the top of the screen. That one worked. But this one, (Im using the exact same source, Cheezscape 80)needs a different spelling or something of the WritePlayers();. I also used Mod Taharok’s skill thing on my last, and got everything working, till I had to restart. So someone please tell me how to put the WritePlayers(); in under public boolean process (FOR CHEEZSCAPE 80!)[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 07:58:20 PM[/size][hr]Also another thing. When ppl playing on my server, and level up, they disconnect. It happened on my last server, even when I had the stuff up. Then, I coded it in my friend’s server, and it worked…
